Text.Page:
We've got to stop the raiders that the vampirs send out from Sinestral Manor.

{@LinkCreature:488#4#Lokian defenders}, {@LinkCreature:488#7#Lokian devastators}, {@LinkCreature:488#12#Lokian darkweavers}, and {@LinkCreature:488#14#Lokian bloodshapers} have caused us trouble for far too long.

And why are Lokians working with vampirs, anyway?
Took care of the Lokians, eh? Excellent.
